hero.name: Bevin Benet
hero.heading: I’m Bevin Benet
hero.description: I love solving problems. Trying to learn new things always. Data Science Student, Martial Artist, and a Tech Enthusiast.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR ANY CODING PROJECTS
about.description: I am a professional developer with experience in this field. I can create any website, web application or AI related project. I am also a data science student and a martial artist. I love to solve problems and learn new things. I am always available for any coding projects. Feel free to contact me. Currently I a studying about Strapi framework and also finetuning LLMs
